{{ item.title }}

{{ item.price | currency }}

{{ item.qty }}

Total: {{ totalPrice | currency }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { IProduct } from '../interface/product'; import { PruductService } from '../service/pruduct.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.scss'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { cartItems: any[] = []; totalPrice = 0; constructor(private service: PruductService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.cartItems = this.service.getItems().map(item => ({ ...item, qty: item.id|| 1 })); this.calculateTotal(); } increaseQty(index: number) { this.cartItems[index].qty++; this.calculateTotal(); } decreaseQty(index: number) { if (this.cartItems[index].qty > 1) { this.cartItems[index].qty--; this.calculateTotal(); } } removeitem(item: any) { this.service.removeItem(item); this.cartItems = this.cartItems.filter(i => i.id !== item.id); this.calculateTotal(); } calculateTotal() { this.totalPrice = this.cartItems .reduce((sum, item) => sum + (item.price * item.qty), 0); } }
